Class AdminJobStatusRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.konakartadmin.app.AdminJobStatusRequest

  • public class AdminJobStatusRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    Job Status Request Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int id
      id - need one of these so that we can implement AdminObjectIf
      private boolean includeExecutingJobs
      to request that status information on executing jobs is returned
      private boolean includeScheduledJobs
      to request that status information on scheduled jobs is returned
      private java.lang.String name
      to request that status information on scheduled jobs containing the specified name is returned
      private java.lang.String orderBy
      For setting the order of the returned jobs

        public void setOrderBy(java.lang.String orderBy)
        For setting the order of the returned jobs. Options are:
        • AdminDataDescriptor.ORDER_BY_NAME_ASCENDING
        • AdminDataDescriptor.ORDER_BY_NAME_DESCENDING
        • AdminDataDescriptor.ORDER_BY_DATE_ASCENDING
        • AdminDataDescriptor.ORDER_BY_DATE_DESCENDING
